summary: This is an email from attorney Edwards Pottinger scheduling a meeting to speak with victims of Jeffrey Epstein on June 29, 2020. It appears to be coordination for legal proceedings or victim interviews related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Edwards Pottinger

keyFacts: Attorney Edwards Pottinger was coordinating meetings with Epstein victims in June 2020.
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings or victim interviews related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The document shows victim engagement by legal counsel in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
